title: I may be the least aware typography fan...
content:
I love the minimal sans look that you get on a lot of sites as text. I was thinking it may be arial, but without any antialiasing on it. Whatever the case, I wanna recreate it in Adobe... Arial in adobe is anti-aliased and clean as can be.. not the look I need.

Am I correct on the ID of types like this? Let me who you what I mean.

Even the "loading data" text uses it. The type in this site. What am I not finding?

[http://kashiwasato.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717131112/http:/kashiwasato.com/ "http://kashiwasato.com/")?
author: kamolahy

comments.content:
WOW - I love that website - its hypnotic...

Try FFF Calypso

[http://www.fontsforflash.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717131112/http:/www.fontsforflash.com/ "http://www.fontsforflash.com/")

Cheers  
CM
Yeah, fantastic designer and tastefully done flash.
Rather nice usage of flash indeed, but I despise the use of sound on websites. It annoys the hell out of me.
